block_comment: This block of code implements a flip-flop with a synchronous positive edge trigger for signal "phy_rddata_en_r1". The signal "phy_rddata_en_r1" gets assigned the value of "prde" at the positive edge of the clock signal "clk". The delay "#TCQ" sets the time it takes for the assigned value to propagate to the output, hence implementing a latch timing mechanism.
